33030.affected_area: Alberta, Moose Jaw and Swift Current Area
live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
97% of affected customers have been refreshed. We anticipate all remaining customers will be online within another hour.
Around 80% of customers service has been restored. For those who remain we ask for your continued patience as we finish this refresh process. Thank you.
The refresh of affected equipment is continuing. Many customers services has already been restored yet many more are still affected.
The refresh of affected equipment is continuing. Many customers services has already been restored yet many more are still affected.

Teams are currently working through refreshes of affected equipment. Most customers should see services come back online on their own.  Please check the box from time to time to see if services have been restored.  We will provide further updates as we get them.
We are working towards a resolution.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
